directory.manager.imp

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • directory.manager.imp.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDirectoryManager

    @Service
public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDirectoryManager
    Master 2 ISL 2017/2018 Couche qui interargie avec la Dao et qui sert de liaison aux controllers
    Author:
    MASLIAH Yann, TIGRARA Redouane
